member.name: T:LOCCounterStd.IOutputType
member.summary: An inheritable class for producing save-able output from data procduced by the Sloc class.

member.name: P:LOCCounterStd.IOutputType.ShortTypeName
member.summary: Get/set the name for the type of output to be produced.

member.name: P:LOCCounterStd.IOutputType.Loc
member.summary: Get/set the information (about the lines of code) to be processed.

member.name: P:LOCCounterStd.IOutputType.NewLine
member.summary: Get/set the newline string to append to each line.

member.name: M:LOCCounterStd.IOutputType.Dump
member.summary: Process the contents of Loc
member.returns: Text in a form appropriate for ShortTypeName.
